name: Wyndfall
description:
"Wyndfall" is a first person open world roguelike made for the 2022 PROCJAM / 7DFPS jam.  Use your gadgets to navigate the skies and avoid the cops for as long as you can.  Steal a plane in midair and use it to make your getaway.

Goal - Avoid the cops

Controls

Left Click - Grappling Hook

Right Click - Punch

Space - Jet Pack

E - Steal airplane

W A S D E Q - Fly airplane
